headline.main: Storm Ahead on TV Ads for Children; U.S. Agencies Plan Inquiries

docs.abstract: Article on significance of upcoming FTC and FCC investigations into quality of TV ads aimed at children; drawing (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Although it has been under a constant barrage of criticism for years, television advertising aimed at children has generally managed to stay out of the political arena.
docs.snippet: Although it has been under a constant barrage of criticism for years, television advertising aimed at children has generally managed to stay out of the political arena.
